mapper.select: WITH CARTVIEW AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CART_MEMBER, CART_PROD , MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_MAIL FROM CART INNER JOIN MEMBER ON(CART_MEMBER = MEM_ID) ) SELECT PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_LGU, PROD_BUYER, PROD_COST, PROD_PRICE, PROD_SALE, PROD_OUTLINE, PROD_DETAIL, PROD_IMG, PROD_TOTALSTOCK, TO_CHAR(PROD_INSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), PROD_PROPERSTOCK, PROD_SIZE, PROD_COLOR, PROD_DELIVERY, PROD_UNIT, PROD_QTYIN, PROD_QTYSALE, PROD_MILEAGE , MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_MAIL FROM PROD LEFT OUTER JOIN CARTVIEW ON (PROD_ID = CART_PROD) WHERE PROD_ID = #{prod_id}
